title: Clothes Store
desc: This is a real clothing store, all the functionality is fully working, so if you send a message on the contact us tab, I will receive it! Also, the login and account creation functionality work, and I have reliable data on who has registered and logged in.

title: Rooms Booking
desc: This is a beautifully made component for the "Book a room" tab for some hotel

title: Admin panel
desc: This is the visual part of the admin panel for creating new courses for students. This app has no functional, just dumb UI

title: Component With Sorted Cards
desc: Just a beautiful component that sorts the cards inside
